title.jp: We don't use glasses merely as a vision correction tool or a fashion accessory (...) That is our Glasses Club.

synopsis: The Glasses Club (comprising of five boys: Akira, Mitsuki, Takuma, Yukiya and Hayato) are determined to successfully create a pair of X-ray glasses in time for the school's vision test, in order to see the female nurse giving out the test naked.

title.jp: Any Man Who Wears Glasses Cannot Be a Bad Man / The Current Strongest Frames

synopsis: Part 1: While cleaning the old club room, Hayato find the Glasses Club's photo albums and remembers when he saw the Glasses Club for the first time at the entrance ceremony. Part 2: After testing out frame strength on glasses after school, Yukiya has some bad luck on his way to Akira's house.

title.jp: I Hope You Finish The X-Ray Glasses

synopsis: The Glasses Club neglects their studies in their busy pursuit of the development of the X-Ray Glasses Mk. 35. They come up with a secret plan to get them to their fun club activities faster: they create 55 minute clocks, and swap them out for the clocks all over the school. What they don't realize is that this will cut their club activities short too...

title.jp: This is What it Means to Wear Real Glasses! / Glasses Reflect The Soul and Who You Truly Are

synopsis: Mitsuki stares into the mirror, practicing different ways to get the corners of his mouth to line up with his glasses when he smiles. One particular smile causes a golden light to shine from his face. The ratio of the distance between the corners of his mouth and the distances between the corners of his mouth to his glasses is 1:1.618. Mitsuki overflows with hope as he realizes what he's done. Morning. The birds sing in the trees. An alarm clock goes off. Takuma rolls out of bed; he's bent his temple. This is a day in the life of the Suzumine brothers.

title.jp: Even if He is, He Wouldn't Tell Some Jerk in Fake Glasses / It's an ultrasonic cleaner for glasses with lenses

synopsis: Rain: the final boss of glasses wearers. The boys have devised an ingenious new pair of glasses, and brave the storm atop their tandem bikeâ€¦to victory.
The Glasses Club goes in search for the perfect glasses wipes, and run into a rival group.

title.jp: Come, Glasses Wearers! Your Glasses Will Change the World!

synopsis: Himakai is plotting to disband Meganebu, unless they find a fifth member. Reminder: Hayato is still a provisionary member!

title.jp: As Long As My Glasses Sparkle, You Won`t Get Away With It!

synopsis: Someone has been sabotaging the lunch hour for each member of Meganebu. Super Detective Mitsuki is on the case!
The older members of Meganebu head off for a school trip to Okinawa. Meanwhile, the juniors get into their own misadventures.

title.jp: The Rules Say You`re Safe, But Glasses Say You`re Out / When I Look at the Glasses Club, It Makes Me Think of Us Back Then

synopsis: Its all fun and games until Akira finds a board game that could come between the players and their glasses. Who will win and will they make a spec-tacle of themselves?

title.jp: It`s Only Natural That Glasses Wearers Love Glasses

synopsis: Hima High's culture festival draws near, and the student council's plan to build a beautiful tower to bring the school more popularity is supported only by the boys of Meganebu.
Akira and the rest of Meganebu unveil their treasure hunt game at the culture festival. Later the Student Council reveals their grand tower to the world.
